            \begin{circuitdiagram}{32}{32}
                % ---- '*PA' pmos pattern ----
                \trans[\wireUD{0.5}]{penh*}{6}{16}{R}{}{$*_{PA}$}
                \pin{3}{17.5}{L}{A}
                % ---- '*PB' pmos pattern ----
                \trans[\wireUD{0.5}]{penh*}{6}{22}{R}{}{$*_{PB}$}
                \pin{3}{23.5}{L}{B}
                % ---- '*PB1' pmos pattern ----
                \trans[\wireUD{0.5}]{penh*}{14}{22}{R}{}{$*_{PB1}$}
                \pin{11}{23.5}{L}{B1}
                 \power{8}{25}{U}{}
                % ---- '*PB2' pmos pattern ----
                \trans[\wireUD{0.5}]{penh*}{6}{28}{R}{}{$*_{PB2}$}
                \pin{3}{29.5}{L}{B2}
                 \power{8}{31}{U}{}
                % ---- '*NA' nmos pattern ----
                \trans[\wireUD{0.5}]{nenh*}{6}{10}{R}{$*_{NA}$}{}
                \pin{3}{8.5}{L}{A}
                % ---- '*NB' nmos pattern ----
                \trans[\wireUD{0.5}]{nenh*}{14}{10}{R}{$*_{NB}$}{}
                \pin{11}{8.5}{L}{B}
                \ground{8}{7}{D}
                % ---- '*NB1' nmos pattern ----
                \trans[\wireUD{0.5}]{nenh*}{6}{4}{R}{$*_{NB1}$}{}
                \pin{3}{2.5}{L}{B1}
                % ---- '*NB2' nmos pattern ----
                \trans[\wireUD{0.5}]{nenh*}{14}{4}{R}{$*_{NB2}$}{}
                \pin{11}{2.5}{L}{B2}
                \ground{8}{1}{D}
                \ground{16}{1}{D}
                % ---- output pattern ----
                \pin{28}{13}{R}{Z}
                \wire{24}{13}{27}{13}
                \wire{8}{13}{24}{13}
            \end{circuitdiagram}
        \end{center}
